title: wevu core typing demo
description: 核心演示：从 0 清空并逐字输入 index.vue，最后手动演示智能提示。

scenes.title: Type Code From Zero
scenes.description: 字符级输入完整页面代码

moves.content:
<script setup lang="ts">
import { computed, ref } from 'wevu'

definePageJson({
  navigationBarTitleText: 'Demo Time From Zero',
})

const count = ref(0)
const doubled = computed(() => count.value * 2)

function increase() {
  count.value += 1
}

function reset() {
  count.value = 0
}
</script>

<template>
  <view class="page">
    <text class="title">weapp-vite + wevu</text>
    <text class="subtitle">Demo Time 从 0 打字演示</text>

    <view class="panel">
      <text class="line">count: {{ count }}</text>
      <text class="line">doubled: {{ doubled }}</text>
    </view>

    <view class="actions">
      <button class="btn" type="primary" @tap="increase">+1</button>
      <button class="btn" @tap="reset">Reset</button>
    </view>
  </view>
</template>
